title: Global Retail CRM Transformation

impact: 35% increase in sales productivity, 50% reduction in customer response time.

title: AI-Driven Supply Chain Optimization

solution: Developed predictive analytics model using machine learning for demand forecasting.
impact: 20% reduction in inventory costs, 95% forecast accuracy.

title: Enterprise SAP Migration

impact: 40% faster processing times, seamless global operations.
